multicall(bytes[]).details: Receives and executes a batch of function calls on this contract.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.cohortId: The Merkle root of the cohort.
params.index: A value from the generated input list.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

AlreadyWithdrawn().notice: Error thrown when there's nothing to withdraw.

CliffNotReached(uint256,uint256).notice: Error thrown when the cliff period is not over yet.

CohortDoesNotExist().notice: Error thrown when a cohort with the provided id does not exist.

DistributionEnded(uint256,uint256).notice: Error thrown when the distribution period ended.

DistributionOngoing(uint256,uint256).notice: Error thrown when the distribution period did not end yet.

InvalidParameters().notice: Error thrown when a function receives invalid parameters.

InvalidProof().notice: Error thrown when the Merkle proof is invalid.

MerkleRootCollision().notice: Error thrown when a cohort with an already existing merkle tree is attempted to be added.

NotInVesting(bytes32,address).notice: Error thrown when the input address has been excluded from the vesting.

TransferFailed(address,address,address).notice: Error thrown when a transfer failed.

Claimed(bytes32,address,uint256).notice: This event is triggered whenever a call to #claim succeeds.

CohortAdded(bytes32).notice: This event is triggered whenever a call to #addCohort succeeds.

Withdrawn(address,uint256).notice: This event is triggered whenever a call to #withdraw succeeds.

addCohort(bytes32,uint256,uint64,uint64).notice: Allows the owner to add a new cohort.

claim(bytes32,uint256,address,uint256,by.notice: Claim the given amount of the token to the given address. Reverts if the inputs are invalid.

getClaimableAmount(bytes32,uint256,addre.notice: Returns the amount of funds an account can claim at the moment.

getClaimed(bytes32,address).notice: Returns the amount of funds an account has claimed.

getCohort(bytes32).notice: Returns the parameters of a specific cohort.

isDisabled(bytes32,uint256).notice: Check if the address in a cohort at the index is excluded from the vesting.

lastEndingCohort().notice: Returns the id/Merkle root of the cohort ending at the latest.

setDisabled(bytes32,uint256).notice: Exclude the address in a cohort at the index from the vesting.

token().notice: Returns the address of the token distributed by this contract.

withdraw(address).notice: Allows the owner to reclaim the tokens after the distribution has ended.
